summary.span: 表示功能區使用者介面的根項目，可主控快速存取工具列、應用程式功能表，以及標籤。

span.span: Represents the root element of a ribbon user interface that hosts a Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tabs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能區會是一種命令列，會組織成一系列的應用程式視窗頂端的索引標籤的應用程式的功能。A ribbon is a command bar that organizes the features of an application into a series of tabs at the top of the application window. 它會取代傳統的功能表列和工具列。It replaces both the traditional menu bar and toolbars. 類別是功能區使用者介面 (UI) 在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 的根項目。The class is the root element of a ribbon user interface (UI) in Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). 類別裝載，則，和一或多個控制項。The class hosts a , a , and one or more controls. 這些控制項，然後裝載各種不同的按鈕和功能表的控制項，可讓存取應用程式的命令。These controls then host a variety of button and menu controls that enable access to application commands. 下列清單顯示典型的階層架構的功能區項目。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of ribbon elements. - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - - - - - - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - ## Examples 下列範例會示範一個簡單的功能區，由 Visual Studio 2010 範本的 [說明] 窗格與新增的快速存取工具列項目。The following example shows a simple ribbon that is created by the Visual Studio 2010 template, with help pane and Quick Access Toolbar elements added. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#RibbonDefault](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbondefault)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用*關聯式索引標籤*顯示群組的相關只在特定內容中的命令。You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context. 內容相關標籤群組所顯示或隱藏 根據指定的準則。Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria. 比方說，當偵測到平板電腦的輸入，或圖片工具索引標籤群組可能會顯示選取的映像物件時，可能會顯示 [筆墨工具] 索引標籤群組。For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected. ## Examples 下列範例所示名為**畫筆**位於**筆跡工具**內容相關標籤群組。The following example shows a named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group. ```xaml                              ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定讓使用者能夠存取您的應用程式的說明內容的 [說明] 窗格的內容。You can set the contents of the help pane to enable users to access help content for your application. 您通常會設定單一按鈕，啟動個別的 [說明] 視窗的屬性。You will typically set the property to a single button that launches a separate help window. 不過，您可以定義任何進入 [說明] 窗格的內容。However, you can define any content to go in the help pane. 您可以藉由設定指定的配置和內容的外觀屬性。You can specify the layout and appearance of the content by setting the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能區會摺疊自動，當應用程式視窗調整大小時，而且沒有足夠的空間，以有意義的方式顯示功能區。The ribbon collapses automatically when the application window is resized and does not have enough space to display the ribbon in a meaningful way. 功能區摺疊時，所有的功能區項目會隱藏起來。When the ribbon is collapsed, all ribbon elements are hidden from view. 當功能區會摺疊時，就會發生事件。When the ribbon is collapsed, the event occurs. 展開功能區時，就會發生事件。When the ribbon is expanded, the event occurs. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`、 快速存取工具列、 應用程式功能表和索引標籤標題都會顯示，但是索引標籤內容都會在下拉式清單，以及預設不顯示。When the property is `true`, the Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tab headers are shown, but the tab contents are put in a drop-down and are not shown by default. 當使用者選取的索引標籤標頭時，下拉式清單索引標籤會開啟，並顯示其內容。When a user selects a tab header, the drop-down for the tab is opened and its contents are shown. 選取或取消選取索引標籤標頭切換之間的屬性`true`和`false`。Selecting or deselecting the tab header toggles the property between `true` and `false`. 如果屬性是`false`，則屬性也是`false`。If the property is `false`, the property is also `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者可以最小化功能區的功能區上按一下滑鼠右鍵，然後選取**功能區最小化**從內容功能表。A user can minimize the ribbon by right-clicking the ribbon and selecting **Minimize the Ribbon** from the context menu. 當屬性是`true`、 快速存取工具列、 應用程式功能表和索引標籤標題都會顯示，但是索引標籤內容都會在下拉式清單，以及預設不顯示。When the property is `true`, the Quick Access Toolbar, Application Menu, and tab headers are shown, but the tab contents are put in a drop-down and are not shown by default. 當使用者選取的索引標籤標頭時，下拉式清單索引標籤會開啟，並顯示其內容。When a user selects a tab header, the drop-down for the tab is opened and its contents are shown. 如果屬性是`true`、 選取或取消選取索引標籤標頭切換屬性之間`true`和`false`。If the property is `true`, selecting or deselecting the tab header toggles the property between `true` and `false`. 如果屬性是`false`，則屬性也是`false`。If the property is `false`, the property is also `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常會設定上的屬性而不是設定屬性。You will typically set the property on the instead of setting the property. 所示的標題列如果屬性是`null`。The is shown in the title bar of the if the property of the is `null`. 如果屬性不是`null`，則標題會顯示而不是值。If the property is not `null`, the title is shown instead of the value. 如果裝載於而不是，則旁邊快速存取工具列中，如下所示。If the is hosted in a instead of a , the is shown next to the Quick Access Toolbar, below the . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
